knimeNode.name: Opera Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads a list of Opera '.res'-files into Knime.

fullDescription.intro: Reads a list of Opera '.res'-files into Knime. This is done by searching for res-files recursively within the specified directory or by selecting a list of files directly.
fullDescription.option:
There are two modes of operation. Either you can choose a single directory in which the nodes will search for Opera files. The search is applied not only to the direct directory contents but also to also its subfolders.
The second mode is to select a set of files (by keeping the apple/windows-key pressed while selecting files).
